tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE VoterVerification ( 
    voter_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    first_name VARCHAR(50), 
    last_name VARCHAR(50), 
    date_of_birth DATE, 
    address VARCHAR(100), 
    eligibility_status BOOLEAN 
);

CREATE TABLE voter (
    voter_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    address VARCHAR(100),
    eligible_to_vote BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE voter_registration (
    registration_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    voter_id INT,
    registration_date DATE,
    verification_status BOOLEAN,
    FOREIGN KEY (voter_id) REFERENCES voter(voter_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Voter (
    voter_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name TEXT,
    last_name TEXT,
    age INT,
    address TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE VoteHistory (
    vote_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    voter_id INT,
    vote_cast_time TIMESTAMP,
    vote_candidate TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (voter_id) REFERENCES Voter(voter_id)
);

CREATE TABLE voters(
    voter_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    voter_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    date_of_birth DATE,
    address VARCHAR(100),
    is_eligible BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE voter_ids(
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    voter_id INT,
    id_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    id_number VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    expiry_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE voter_information (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    last_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    date_of_birth DATE NOT NULL,
    address VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    is_registered BOOLEAN NOT NULL
);
